dialogue_turns.speaker: Narrator
dialogue_turns.text: Back in 2024, a magnitude 4.6 earthquake hit near Taldykorgan, Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Back in twenty twenty four, a magnitude four point six earthquake hit near Taldykorgan, Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the European-Mediterranean Seismological Centre, a magnitude 4.6 earthquake struck at 3:58 PM Astana time, 20 kilometers northwest of Taldykorgan. The National Scientific Center for Seismological Observations and Research of Kazakhstan's Emergency Situations Ministry reported that the epicenter was located 12 kilometers north of Taldykorgan, within Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Huh, that's not a huge difference, but still, it's notable when agencies don't quite match up.
